title: Prof. Dr hab. inż. Radosław Juszczak

yaml.title: Prof. Dr hab. inż. Radosław Juszczak

markdown.markdown: [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5212-7383) | [ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Radoslaw_Juszczak?ev=hdr_xprf&_sg=9NmP1L-8aEvXvLmpQuNkOldwbD3tB8swqdFZ76PiI8uvm6mbA5Y4leRQnMk9m64u) | [Publons](https://publons.com/researcher/3298853/radoslaw-juszczak/) | [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=V18nqg0AAAAJ) | [Scopus](https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=6603564890) | [Email](mailto:radoslaw.juszczak@up.poznan.pl) Poznań University of Life Sciences Faculty of Environmental Engineering and Spatial Planning Laboratory of Bioclimatology, Department of Ecology and Environmental Protection Piątkowska 94, 60-649 Poznań, POLAND Tel: +48 61 846 65 52 Full Professor, environmental scientist specializing in greenhouse gas exchange, carbon and GHG balances, ecosystem responses to climate change, and remote sensing of peatlands. Member of the Polish Academy of Sciences, Committee on Environmental Engineering. ### Research Interests - Greenhouse gas (CO₂, CH₄, H₂O) exchange between terrestrial ecosystems and the atmosphere - Carbon and GHG balances of natural ecosystems - Ecosystem responses to climate change - Climate manipulation experiments (PI of 2 peatland experiments) - Remote sensing of peatlands and Sun Induced Fluorescence - Agrometeorology, agrophysics - Weather and climate extremes ### Memberships & Service - Member, Polish Academy of Sciences; Division IV Technical Sciences; Committee on Environmental Engineering - Member of COST Actions: SENSECO (CA17134), OPTIMISE (ES1903), Climmani (ES1308), EUROSPEC (ES0903) - Reviewer for numerous international journals and funding agencies

Member of the Polish Academy of Sciences, Committee on Environmental Engineering. ### Research Interests - Greenhouse gas (CO₂, CH₄, H₂O) exchange between terrestrial ecosystems and the atmosphere - Carbon and GHG balances of natural ecosystems - Ecosystem responses to climate change - Climate manipulation experiments (PI of 2 peatland experiments) - Remote sensing of peatlands and Sun Induced Fluorescence - Agrometeorology, agrophysics - Weather and climate extremes ### Memberships & Service - Member, Polish Academy of Sciences; Division IV Technical Sciences; Committee on Environmental Engineering - Member of COST Actions: SENSECO (CA17134), OPTIMISE (ES1903), Climmani (ES1308), EUROSPEC (ES0903) - Reviewer for numerous international journals and funding agencies
